statusLine.command: input=$(cat); agent_info=""; if echo "$input" | jq -e '.agent_name' >/dev/null 2>&1; then agent_info=" | $(echo "$input" | jq -r '.agent_name')"; fi; printf '\033[01;32m[%s@%s\033[01;37m %s\033[01;34m%s\033[01;32m]\033[00m ' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename \"$(pwd)\")" "$agent_info"
